description: Hakuba Saguru is another teenage detective, just like http://anidb.net/ch2263 [Kudou Shin`ichi] and http://anidb.net/ch8178 [Hattori Heiji]. However, he does a lot of his work in England, as well as Japan, and has maybe even handled more cases than Shin`ichi and Heiji.
name: Hakuba Saguru
